barker_notes.barker_summary: Moses Austin Bryan to Austin, Saltillo, September 23, 1832, Dr. James Grant of Parras has elected two deputies to the legislature from there in favor of Texas and foreigners.

*div1 type="summary"* *p*Moses Austin Bryan to Austin, Saltillo, September 23, 1832, Dr. James Grant of Parras has elected two deputies to the legislature from there in favor of Texas and foreigners.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"* *p**location_mentioned*Saltillo */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="09-23-1832">September 23d 1832*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dear *person_mentioned*Uncle*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*This will inform you that I am well, and recd, your letter of the *date_mentioned n="09-04-1832">4 of this month */date_mentioned*this morning and with much pleasure, and glad to hear that you have arrived safe *location_mentioned*home */location_mentioned*and that you found all the *person_mentioned*family */person_mentioned*well, you need not be uneasy about me, I am now living with *person_mentioned*Mr. Sharpe*/person_mentioned*. I did get tiard of Friholes and Tortillos and went out to *location_mentioned*Parras */location_mentioned*and stayed with *person_mentioned*Doct Grant*/person_mentioned* about 4 or 6 weeks, and when I started to cotoe a way he told me that he would not let me go back to *location_mentioned*Saltillo */location_mentioned*unless, I would promise not, to go and live with *person_mentioned*Grande */person_mentioned*aney more, but live with *person_mentioned*Mr Sharpe*/person_mentioned*, and I though it was the best plan myself, and so I was not above a month and a half with *person_mentioned*Grande*/person_mentioned*, the *person_mentioned*Doct*/person_mentioned*. is a great *person_mentioned*friend */person_mentioned*of yours and of the *location_mentioned*Colony*/location_mentioned*, he has elected 2 *person_mentioned*biputados [diputados]*/person_mentioned* at *location_mentioned*Parris */location_mentioned*in favor of the *location_mentioned*Colony*/location_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Estrangeros*/person_mentioned*. and has put *person_mentioned*Loco Ernandes*/person_mentioned* out, he sayes if you can onley send two more from *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*he will show them a thing or two; I will stay untill after the fare as it will comencé *date_mentioned n="09-24-1832">to morrow*/date_mentioned* and then it is very probable I will go down to *location_mentioned*Matamoras */location_mentioned*with some of [the] *person_mentioned*strange[r]s*/person_mentioned* over hear to the *location_mentioned*fair*/location_mentioned*, most likley with *person_mentioned*Mr. Dibblee*/person_mentioned* or*person_mentioned* Mr Coldwell*/person_mentioned* I have got but about 8 or 10 Dollars, and *person_mentioned*Huetson */person_mentioned*hasent got a sent to lend me he says, but I must do the best I can I wanted to buy a saddle and rigging but I havent got the money their fore I must do with out. *person_mentioned*Huetson */person_mentioned*talks of going on to the *location_mentioned*Colony */location_mentioned*but I would go by myself before I would go with him he has made a compleate brute of himself. I have got your papers safe I have been obliged to go indet for a leather trunk to *person_mentioned*Mr Coldwell*/person_mentioned* he sayes he will be very apt to go through the *location_mentioned*Colony */location_mentioned*on his return to *location_mentioned*New Yorke*/location_mentioned* and then I can settle with him. nothing more at present but I am in hopes I will see you in the course of a month or two give my respects to *person_mentioned*Mr. and Mrs. Williams*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Mr Hunter*/person_mentioned* and give my love to all the *person_mentioned*family */person_mentioned*and tell them they will see me in course of 2 months at furtherest if I have health I have no preasants for them because I have no money to get them with I have scarce enough money to carry me to *location_mentioned*Matamoros*/location_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*Most Respectfully*/p*
*p*Your *person_mentioned*nephew*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Moses A Bryan */person_mentioned* [Rubric]*/p*
*/div1*
